JOB DESCRIPTION: About the Role          Need to place a senior software engineering role that is expected to create and maintain an end-to-end test automation solution for a portfolio of payment applications.           We are building an automated Test Engineering Solution which covers the full life cycle of testing for a suite of payment applications which have User Interface and IBM MQ based entry/exit points. The desired solution will include the following features: an automated comparison of actual and expected results, determination of the test suite s code coverage, determination of the test suite s coverage of functional requirements, a reusable test data management mechanism, and a test artifact management mechanism that links test scripts, test data, and requirements. This role demands a person who has expertise in object-oriented and component-based software architectures and who can demonstrate how these skills will be applied to the automated testing solution.
